typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		{ hack_license} as string,
		{ vendor_id} as string,
		{ pickup_datetime} as timestamp,
		{ payment_type} as string,
		{ fare_amount} as double,
		{ surcharge} as double,
		{ mta_tax} as double,
		{ tip_amount} as double,
		{ tolls_amount} as double,
		{ total_amount} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> taxiSource
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		rate_code as short,
		store_and_fwd_flag as boolean,
		pickup_datetime as timestamp,
		dropoff_datetime as timestamp,
		passenger_count as short,
		trip_time_in_secs as short,
		trip_distance as double,
		pickup_longitude as double,
		pickup_latitude as double,
		dropoff_longitude as double,
		dropoff_latitude as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> tripSource
taxiSource, tripSource join(taxiSource@medallion == tripSource@medallion
	&& { hack_license} == hack_license,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 aggregate(groupBy(passenger_count),
	avgAmount = round(avg({ total_amount}),2),
		avgTip = round(avg({ tip_amount}),2)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sort(asc(avgTip, true)) ~> Sort1
Join1 aggregate(groupBy(trip_distance),
	avgAmount2 = round(avg({ total_amount}),2),
		avgTip2 = round(avg({ tip_amount}),2)) ~> Aggregate2
